column1: Love this product!!!! My daughter uses it as well as she has sensitive skin and I have mature skin yet we both love it.

I have extremely dry sensitive skin. Washing with soap and water only irritates my face. I need a make-up remover and a cleanser all in one. This does the job beautifully without repeaded steps. Love the the way it leaves my skin moist and soft like no other product I have used. This is a keeper!
I love this product! I was looking for an excellent second cleanse product that kept my skin hydrated and I found it! It's gentle and didn't dry me out. Please don't stop making this!

I love this product!!! I work at a dermatologist office and we highly suggest that our patient's . I just finished a bottle of the Hydro Boost gel and although it works just as well, I find the lotion cleanser to be more hydrating. I only tried the gel due to have oily skin however the lotion seems to suit me best. I will be purchasing this product going forward and will continue to tell my patient's to do the same.
My 10 year old son loves this face wash. It is gentle and effective. Washes away the days dirt without drying his face. We love Neutrogena products!

Gentle, yet effective. Face is left feeling clean, supple, and hydrated. Neutrogena HydroBoost cleansing lotion is a lightweight gel, effective at removing makeup and leaving skin locked in with moisture, from hyaluronic acid. I would recommend this formula to those with acne prone and sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just used this and it took off barely any makeup I had to use it multiple times and now my skin is dry and burning and I don't have sensitive skin. Very disappointed. Doesn't do either of the things it says it does- moisturizes and removes makeup. Returning.
I bought it 3 weeks ago and doesn't take out my makeup. It's a hype

I have used this several times and each time it causes little pimples the next morning. No chance at this point it is anything other than this stuff. Really disappointing because I like it otherwise. The gel version of this didn't cause any problems but wanted to like the formula because of the extra moisturization.
I love this product, I wish my local store carried it.
I really liked this product. I have very dry skin and so I am always looking for something that will keep my skin moisturized for several hours. I found that in this product.

I have had this for a few weeks now, and I can say this is the best cleanser I have ever used for my sensitive skin. It is the first "sensitive skin" cleanser that doesn't sting the skin around my eyes, doesn't break out my skin, and leaves my skin feeling soft and conditioned, but completely clean. I just love it!

Oh, I love this facial cleanser! It is a very gentle, hydrating cleanser that is perfect for my dry, sensitive skin. I absolutely love that it is fragrance-free because I can only use fragrance-free products on my skin. I would give this a 10-star rating!

This is a mild, fragrance free formula that feels like it melts onto skin to instantly remove traces of dirt, oil and makeup without greasy residue. It has hyaluronic acid which is a formula which increases skin's hydration level and lock it in and leaving
skin clean, soft and touchably soff and smooth every time you use it.

This cleanser is very gentle and perfect for sensitive skin. This left my face soft and feeling like there was no traces of dirt and oil left behind. This didn't remove my mascara so I recommend eye makeup remover before using this. Overall this is a product
that will stay a part of my facial routine for a while.

I bought and used this product when I first saw it on the shelfs, now I use it all the time! I wish the price point was a bit lower but it's a great drugstore luxury. I loved the texture of the mosturizer. It was a light gel so it felt like something that
would really moisturize my skin AND IT DID. I found that this was perfect to use at night and to wear under my make up. I now use this product every day.

I love the Neutrogena brand, so I was really excited to test out a new product! Overall, I liked it quite a lot. I used it primarily in the shower as part of my nighttime routine. I liked most how non-drying it was, as I don't usually like to moisturize at night due to tiredness and wanting to avoid acne. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wow I am impressed with this cleansing lotion. It did a good job cleaning away all the makeup at the end of the day, still needed to use some makeup remover to get the rest but it did get most of it and it left my face feeling clean and refreshed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the clean feeling neutrogen Lotion has brought to my face! It removes the unwanted dirt but at the same time makes my face soft! This lotion feels nice and smooth on my face. It is not soapy at all. I highly recommend this product with people with sensitive skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've only used it twice, and sometimes i have to use something several times before i know whether it's going to work well or tear my face up, but so far it seems to be working well. It's not overly drying or making my eczema act up yet, so we'll see how it goes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Strips moisture. Intensly strips moisture. Has to be the corn starch.
I have oily and sensitive skin and this leaves my skin feeling clean without irritation.
I received a free sample of this product, and let me tell you what!!! I fell I love instantly!! My face never felt or looked so alive!
OMG... the first time I actually used this cleanser it was amazing it left my skin so soft and it felt refreshing I have tried so many of their products and this one does not compare:)

This is a gentle cleanser which doesn't sting or dry my skin out unlike most cleansers. The gentle type of this is fragrance free which is a plus for me. I love this line. I'm getting ready to start on my second bottle. Is worth your try.
I love Neutrogena Hydro-Boost Gentle Cleasing Lotionvits great for my dry skin and I am not break out as bad keeping face clean and makeup light means less beakouts.

I love this cleansing lotion because it is mild and fragrance free. It removes my makeup and leaves my skin moisturized and fresh feeling. I would highly recommend you try Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion because it works!

Very gentle on my skin and I'm Oily/Dry/Normal depending on the weather.This cleanser cleans without stripping. Foams but not over foamy. I love it! My face feels super clean afterward! I use it with my Clarisonic and absolutely love it!

This feels like you're applying lotion but it's removing all the ickyness off your face. It's non-dryinf formula feels amazing and leaves your face feeling a deep down clean like a facial . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion is Amazing! My skin has never looked better. It made my skin so soft and so smooth. The smel was great and refreshing. I use this everyday now [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was not able to sample this, However, I have purchased this in the winter months because my skin became very dry from Eczema. It works very well on my skin and I love it alot! However, in the summer I stopped using it because my skin became oily and
I live in a very humid climate.

I found this product to be so so. Cleans your face but doesn't get deep down pore dirt. I wasn't real impressed with this product considering I've used other products from this company that I still buy and use regularly but this will not be one of them.
The product price I found to be very reasonable even a bit lower then some other brands. I do have to say it does keep to its word on being very gentle on the skin.

It is a good cleansing, you can definitely see and feel the difference after using it, the skin is softer and it feels cleaner, the only thing I could say is that I would only use it once a week since it breaks me out using every day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion it makes my face feel and look clean, family members were asking what am I using on my face. The product is oil free so it doesn't leave your face or skin oily, it smell ok [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like that it's gentle and soft on the skin. I will probably continue to use it to remove makeup but not necessarily waterproof makeup and I do like that it doenst irritate my eyes I wish they make these into wipes maybe it will exfoliate a little more? Really am enjoying the product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Hydro boost gentle cleansing lotion is very gentle on the skin. It cleanses the skin. It does not make my skin dry. I feel my skin becomes more soft, clean and smooth after each use. Definitely recommend it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved how this cleanser made my skin feel soft and didn't make my skin feel stiff and dry like others face cleansers I have used. The bottle is also designed great with a easy pump you can get the perfect amount every time! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This stuff is awesome! The Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion, is gentle just like it implies. I myself have a sensitive face and usually can't apply anything around my lips, chin or nose, but with this i had no problem, and it's awesome. I will be buying this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion when washing my face it has removed my makeup off my face and do not leave any residue from the makeup or products. Instead my face feel really nice and clean with only one wash which is impressive to me, out of habit I still wash twice and because also it has a nice smell, overall this is a good cleansing product for my skin and I love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really loved the Hydro boost gentle cleansing lotion. It was very gentle on my sensitive skin. I washed my face and neck with this twice a day and noticed the dirt and black heads are disappearing. My skin feels clean and hydrated, smooth and shiny! My skin looks like it has a natural glowing to it from using this. I had quit using all other products after using this. I would definitely recommend this product and purchase again!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena® Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion is very lightly scented. It has a smooth consistency like a lotion. It goes on smoothly on the skin. It doesn't foam but effectively cleanses the skin. I appreciate that it didn't dry up my skin but helped retain moisture. I would recommend this facial cleanser to all skin types because it cleanses well but helps keep moisture. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked it! It's very light and fresh. I've never used a cleanser like this, and I'm really impressed! There was no irritation or excessive drying out of my skin. It's a very refreshing cleanser that works great! Easy on my sensitive skin. I paired it with the matching moisturizer and it's an absolutely perfect combination. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked that I was able to use it without water and just wipe off , it left my skins soft and a lean I didn't have any break uts from it or red itchiness after use, no smell orgreasy feeling being able to use it with or without water makes it very resistible I can carry it with my and use it any where when my face feel dirty [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It is light and cleans the skin nicely. I used it during my shower and after I didn't feel my skin dry as usual. It complements nicely with neutrogena hydro boost multi vitamin gel. My skin never felt so hydrated and moisturized. I love both products together. Definetely this new line is the best. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product, it is very different from other facial cleaner lotion that you have to use water. This facial lotion gives you the choice to use it on a wet or dry. Leaving your face feeling clean without a greasy residue. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this product as it cleans my skin of residue dirt and makeup leaving my skin feeling soft. I like that it does not irritate my skin unlike other brands I have tried. I use it everyday for night time routine skin clean up. The texture is very light and does not make my skin feel greasy and heavy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was better then most facial cleaners I have tried. It didn't dry my skin out and left it feeling smooth and soft. The smell was nice as well. I really enjoyed this product and will more then likely buy it for myself . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion is best to remove make and to cleanse your skin before going to sleep. it gentle on skin and doesn't leave it dry, dull or irritated like other clensers
i would definitely recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is such a great cleanser. I love that it's a lotion. It doesn't get runny and get in your eyes. It says it doesn't have a smell but it does have slight scent. I have sensitive skin and this didn't bother me at all. It didn't leave my face feeling tight like some other face washes I've used either. Overall, wonderful product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cleans fairly well it has a moisturizing content so my skin is not overly dry and has a pleasant scent although sometimes my skin does dry out a bit especially in the winter would be nice if it was a little bit more moisturizing but I think for the average person that would be great [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this cleansing lotion. My face is very sensitive and turns red from just washing it so I have to be choosy with facial care. This cleansing lotion was definately perfect, with it being creamy and silky when I put it on. It cleaned very well considering ,rinsed off easily, and and was gentle enough for me to use every-day of the week. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

During the winter, my face tends to get really dry, especially around my nose. I found that this lotion helped to combat the dryness without causing my skin to appear oily or breakout. This lightweight formula worked for me! Even my husband tried it and liked the results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cleanser has more of a gel consistency that's very gentle on the skin and it does foam up (I would not describe it as "lotion"). I use this with a cleansing device and really like it! It does a good job cleaning and does not dry out the skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Great product. Cleans well with light suds, rinses easily and leaves skin comfortable and soft. Nice packaging with a dispenser pump - and a little goes a long way - this is an economical face cleanser. Good ingredients, no perfume. And a beautiful blue color... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like Neutrogena hydro boost gentle cleansing lotion because it works great when you put on your face you feel it working into your skin really fast. And makes your skin feel really smoother after uses and looks great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is very gentle on my skin. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry afterward. I love that it has a very light scent. It is also great that this comes with a pump so you can control how much product you get. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After trying this cleansing lotion i am so super excited with the outcome! I have sensitive skin so having found something that is gentle on my skin yet also effective is really nice. The smell is amazing, not too over powerful and it leaves a nice soft feel on the skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As a Neutrogena user , I find this cleanser to be just as great, as the other Neutrogena products, I have. It definitely cleans and leaves your face feeling just that. It doesn't leave no ugly residue or make your face feel tight afterwards. I will continue to use this product and will definitely purchase it, after this bottle is done. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have really dry skin and when I typically use a face wash, it makes my face drier and causes irritation. I have used this product for the past 4 days and it is amazing!!! My face feels fresh and it actually replenishes moisture. I hightly recommend this for anyone, whether you have dry skin or not! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I honestly love this product its very comfortable and smooth in your skin.And the smell of it isnt strong or anything but feels very comfortable on skin i definitely recommend this .I love it alot and happy had the chance to try and happy with the results [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love the bottle and design. You can see the product inside and it just looks high quality! It feels smooth and refreshing on the skin and makes my face feel instantly clean. I have sensitive skin and this gave me no problems. I will be buying this again soon [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is definitely going to be replacing my current facial wash! It has a wonderful, light scent that did not irritate my skin one bit. Instead, it applied very smoothly and left my skin feeling soft and, most importantly, extraordinarily clean! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion! I am sensitive to fragrances, so I like that it's fragrance-free. It really cleanses my face while leaving it hydrated. I would recommend to anyone looking for a gentle, hydrating cleanser. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I honestly wasn't so sure if this Hydro Boost cleansing gel was going to work but I was trully wrong. I absolutely love this product, it felt so good putting it on and after rinsing it made my face feel super clean and extra soft. I definitely recommend this I now add it to my every day routine. Thank you so much! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This mild fragrance free formula melts into skin to remove traces of dirt, oil and makeup without greasy residue. With hyaluronic acid, the formula is clinically proven to increase skin's hydration level and lock it in, leaving skin clean, soft, and touchably supple, every time you cleanse. The Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion has many benefits. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It went on nicely it lathered up well and I felt like it had noticeable results when using this product. I felt like I had a very clean feeling after using this lotion and that it got off anything that my usual makeup wipe may have missed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I already have the Hydra Boost Facial wash, so I was very excited to get to try this one out. Its very unique thin lotion appearance glides right into skin, cleaning away oil, dirt, and impurities your makeup can leave behind. It also leaves a light, clean smell. I highly recommend! I received this product from Nuteogena and HomeTestetClub in exchange for an honest review. All opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved how this applies and smells so good. It didn't dry out my face at all. It doesn't irritate my skin or eyes. I have already bought it again and my sister even took my recommendation and bought it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the NEUTROGENA HYDRO BOOST GENTLE CLEANSING LOTION from the Home Tester Community and used it. it has a great smell and a great cleansing lotion, which cleanses as well as softens my skin. A great product for sure. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The overall appearance of the product is great and also appealing to consumers. I have sensitive skin and this isnt harsh or over-drying. It also doesnt burn or irratate like other cleaners I've tried in the last. I would purchase this and reccommend to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It left my skin feeling amazing and more clean and refreshed than it ever has. Its easy to use and put into your daily routine. Its also safe for sensitive skin witch alot of otger products make me break out this has not done that and it makes me love it even more. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great effective facial cleanser. May face feels clean but not dry after using this. I like that it's fragrance free and non irritating. This works very well at removing my makeup at the end of the day. Overall great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion this mild, fragrance free formula melts onto skin to instantly remove traces of dirt, oil and makeup without greasy residue. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion is gentle on your skin, but can remove dirt and makeup without doing any harm to your skin. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion has a nice smooth texture. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gentle Cleansing Lotion is a must buy! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The morning after i used this product, my skin completely broke out.

This product is seriously a life saver! My skin has its days were it is overly oily one day or some serious pop up pimples over night. I love this it gets the job done and leaves me feeling soft,clean and refreshed
We have been using Neutrogena products for several years now. They are absolutely wonderful. We have sensitive skin and this brand bever irritates our skin.
I found this very gentle on my skin. There were no dry patches or redness just a very great feeling of being clean but not dried out. My face loves this.
First of all, I like this feeling after using lotion- it seems like my skin more hydreted and fresh. Also it leaves a pleasant scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have been using Neutrogena products for years. The hydro boost gentle cleansing lotion is one of my favourite products that I have used so far. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I found that it left my face feeling fresh and clean as well it did not leave it feeling dried out as some face moisturizer do. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really liked the way this worked on my skin. I also loved that i could use it in either wet or dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
